contentrichtext.text: '''IAS''' may refer to: {{toc right}} == Science == *[[Indian Academy of Sciences]] *[[Islamic World Academy of Sciences]], an organization promoting science and technology in the Muslim world *[[Iowa Archeological Society]], United States *[[Iranian Arachnological Society]], for the study of arachnids in Iran *[[Institute of Agricultural Sciences, Banaras Hindu University]], in India ===Institutes for Advanced Study=== *[[Institute for Advanced Study]], in Princeton, New Jersey, United States **[[IAS computer]], built at the Institute for Advanced Study *[[Institute of Advanced Study (Durham)]], in County Durham, England *[[Institute for Advanced Studies at The Hebrew University of Jerusalem]], Israel *[[Institute for Advanced Study, Berlin]], Germany *[[Institute for Advanced Study at University of Minnesota]], United States == Finance== *[[International Accounting Standards]] *[[Internal Audit Service (European Commission)]] *[[Investment Analysts Society of Southern Africa]] *[[Investment Analysts Society of Sothther Africa]] == Religion == *[[International Association of Scientologists]] *[[International Association of Sufism]] == Health == *[[International AIDS Society]], an association of HIV/AIDS professionals *[[Internal anal sphincter]], human anatomy == Politics == *[[Institute for Anarchist Studies]] *[[Izquierda Asturiana]], a political party in Spain == Technology == === Aeronautics === *[[Indicated airspeed]] *[[Institute of Aerospace Sciences]], in the United States *[[Institut aéronautique et spatial]], in France *[[Iași International Airport]], IATA designation for the airport in Iași, Romania *[[IAS Cargo Airlines]], a British airline === Computing === *[[Internet Authentication Service]] *Internet Application Server, a component of [[Oracle Application Server]] from Oracle Corporation *IAS, a version of Digital Equipment Corporation's [[RSX-11]] operating system == Other uses== *[[Indian Administrative Service]], civil service in India *[[Independent Australian Scouts]] *[[Instituto Ayrton Senna]], an NGO in Brasil *[[Inventory of American Sculpture]], a database organized by the Smithsonian Institution *[[Immunisation Awareness Society]], a New Zealand anti-vaccination group *[[International American School of Warsaw]], a preK–12 school in Poland *[[IEEE Industry Applications Society]] *Integrated Accessibility Standards, part of the [[Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act, 2005|AODA]] *[[International Automated Systems]], an American company {{disambig}}
